username.max: Username is too long - should be {{max}} chars maximum.
username.alphanumeric: Username can only contain latin chars A-Z and digits 0-9.

password.min: Password is too short - should be {{min}} chars minimum.
password.max: Password is too long - should be {{max}} chars maximum.
password.uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase character.
password.lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase character.
password.digit: Must contain at least one number.
password.special: Your password must contain at least one of the following special characters: ^ $ * . [ ] { } ( ) ? - " ! @ # % & / \ , > < \' : ; | _ ~ `
password.alphanumeric: Username can only contain latin chars A-Z.

terms.required: Please accept the terms of use.

buttons.termsText: I agree to the collection of information in cookies, I agree with Privacy Policy and with Terms of Use, Gambling isn’t forbidden by my local authorities and I’m at least 18 years old.

accountActivation.text2: Please enter 6 digit number below to activate your account.
